changeSet.sql: CREATE TRIGGER account_state_arch_i_trg AFTER INSERT ON account_state FOR EACH ROW BEGIN INSERT INTO account_state_arch (id, party_id, artwork_stock_id, quantity, amount, change_date, action_type) VALUES (NEW.id, NEW.party_id, NEW.artwork_stock_id, NEW.quantity, NEW.amount, NOW(), 'I'); END

changeSet.author: thefattony
changeSet.sql: CREATE TRIGGER account_state_arch_u_trg AFTER UPDATE ON account_state FOR EACH ROW BEGIN INSERT INTO account_state_arch (id, party_id, artwork_stock_id, quantity, amount, change_date, action_type) VALUES (NEW.id, NEW.party_id, NEW.artwork_stock_id, NEW.quantity, NEW.amount, NOW(), 'U'); END

changeSet.author: thefattony
changeSet.sql: CREATE TRIGGER account_state_d_trg AFTER DELETE ON account_state FOR EACH ROW BEGIN SIGNAL SQLSTATE '45000' SET MESSAGE_TEXT = 'delete is not permitted'; END
